metadata.reheating: Warm gently on low heat; do not boil
metadata.pairing: Cinnamon rolls, ginger biscuits, quiet evenings

items.notes: small pinch, for Gombocom, Ciraf, Silt version

instructions.title: Heat the base
instructions.step: Warm the milk and cream in a medium pot over medium heat until steaming â€” do not let it boil.

instructions.title: Add dry ingredients
instructions.step: Whisk in cocoa powder, sugar/honey, cinnamon, and nutmeg.

instructions.title: Melt the chocolate
instructions.step: Add chopped dark chocolate and whisk until smooth, glossy, and fully melted.

instructions.title: Finish the hot chocolate
instructions.step: Remove from heat and stir in vanilla.

substeps.title: For Small Kumpli version
substeps.step: Add a tiny pinch of chili for a warm playful kick.

instructions.title: Whipped cream
instructions.step: Beat the cream to soft peaks; add sugar or vanilla if desired.

instructions.title: Salted caramel
instructions.step: Heat sugar + water until deep golden (do not stir). Remove from heat and whisk in butter. Add cream and salt; whisk until silky.

instructions.title: Assemble the mugs
instructions.step: Pour the hot chocolate into cups, add whipped cream, drizzle with caramel, and sprinkle a hint of salt for sparkle.
